info.name: TT DeepDark: change msg list highlight/selection
info.description: Better highlights the currently selected message. Reactivates the hightlight of the currently focused (when you navigate in the list without selecting) message. Please remember that the current message (navigating with Up and Down, for example) is always selected and focused. You really don't need to use TT DeepDark to use this. But the changes may or may not be visible or pleasant, according to your current theme.
